TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebSpaceOperationsExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The Web Sites Management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with the Windows Azure Web Sites service to manage your web sites. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and Windows Azure Web Sites service. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn166981.aspx for more information)
